summary: Premium luxury eCommerce website for BONITARA – Inspired By Elegance. Features: Home page with hero, featured categories, best sellers, about section, reviews, newsletter; 4 main categories (Soap Making, Candle Making, Resin Art, Fragrance) each with 25+ products with full product details, pricing, SKU, stock, wishlist, related products; Wholesale page with inquiry form; FAQ, Shipping Policy, Terms & Conditions, Return & Refund Policy, Contact Us pages; cart, checkout, user accounts, order tracking, inventory management, admin dashboard, blog section; Razorpay/Stripe/UPI integration; luxury UI with ivory/beige/soft gold/charcoal palette, animations, hover effects, elegant typography; SEO optimized; email-enabled features (newsletter, contact form, wholesale inquiry form, order emails).
architectural_notes: Brand name: BONITARA – Inspired By Elegance
Color palette: ivory, beige, soft gold, charcoal
India-based business; GST/PAN required for wholesale; pricing in INR (₹)
Email must be enabled on account for newsletter, contact form, wholesale inquiry, and order emails
known_issues: Previous build ran for 3+ days without completing — canceled and restarting
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Luxury eCommerce hero banner with soft bokeh floral background in ivory and gold tones, elegant and minimal (hero-banner.dim_1920x900.png)
- BONITARA brand wordmark logo in gold lettering on transparent background, serif font, refined and minimal (bonitara-logo.dim_400x120.png)
- Soap Making category card background — artisan soap bars arranged elegantly on marble surface in warm tones (category-soap.dim_600x400.png)
- Candle Making category card background — lit candles with soft glow on beige linen surface (category-candle.dim_600x400.png)
- Resin Art category card background — colorful resin art pieces with gold accents on neutral background (category-resin.dim_600x400.png)
- Fragrance category card background — perfume bottles and dried botanicals on ivory background (category-fragrance.dim_600x400.png)

existing_features.title: Build a Home page with a full-width hero section, featured categories section (Soap Making, Candle Making, Resin Art, Fragrance), best sellers product grid, about/brand story section, customer reviews carousel, and newsletter signup section.
Create 4 product category pages — Soap Making, Candle Making, Resin Art, and Fragrance — each displaying 25+ products with filtering and sorting options.
Build individual product detail pages showing full product info: name, description, price, SKU, stock status, image gallery, related products, and Add to Cart / Wishlist controls.
Implement a shopping cart with item management (add, remove, update quantity), subtotal calculation, and proceed to checkout flow.
Build a checkout page with shipping address form, order summary, and payment method selection supporting Razorpay, Stripe, and UPI placeholder options.
Implement user account system with registration, login, profile management, order history, and order tracking.
Build a Wholesale page with bulk pricing tiers, MOQ (minimum order quantity) information, private label details, GST information, and an email-enabled inquiry form.
Create static informational pages: FAQ, Shipping Policy, Terms & Conditions, Return & Refund Policy, and Contact Us with a functional contact form.
Build an Admin Dashboard allowing management of products (add/edit/delete), inventory levels, order management with status updates, and viewing wholesale and contact inquiries.
Build a Blog section with a listing page and individual blog post detail pages.

Apply a luxury visual theme across all pages using an ivory/beige/soft gold/charcoal color palette, elegant serif typography for headings, smooth animations, hover effects on interactive elements, and fully mobile-responsive layouts.
Generate and render a luxury brand hero background image and a BONITARA logo as static assets used throughout the site.
